typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Speciality_KEY as string,
		{CMS SPECIALTY CODE} as string,
		{CMS SPECIALTY DESCRIPTION} as string,
		{PROVIDER TAXONOMY CODE} as string,
		{PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION TYPE} as string,
		{PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION CLASSIFICATION and SPECIALIZATION} as string,
		{RBI DATA SPECIALITY CODE} as string,
		{PROVIDER TYPE} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Speciality_KEY as string,
		{CMS SPECIALTY CODE} as string,
		{CMS SPECIALTY DESCRIPTION} as string,
		{PROVIDER TAXONOMY CODE} as string,
		{PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION TYPE} as string,
		{PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION CLASSIFICATION and SPECIALIZATION} as string,
		{RBI DATA SPECIALITY CODE} as string,
		{PROVIDER TYPE} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 sink(input(
		Specialty_ID as string,
		Specialty_Description as string,
		Taxonomy_Code as string,
		Taxonomy_Desc_Type as string,
		Taxonomy_Description as string,
		Provider_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Specialty_ID = Speciality_KEY,
		Specialty_Description = {CMS SPECIALTY DESCRIPTION},
		Taxonomy_Code = {PROVIDER TAXONOMY CODE},
		Taxonomy_Desc_Type = {PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION TYPE},
		Taxonomy_Description = {PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION CLASSIFICATION and SPECIALIZATION},
		Provider_Type_Code = {PROVIDER TYPE}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
